profile:
Moderator from May 2004 to March 2008.

Fascites et haineux de tout poil (misogynes, xénophobes, homophobes, ...), vous inquiétez pas, si vous crevez pas la bouche ouverte, on viendra vous chercher à la batte de baseball.

"Das Schöne am Leben ist, dass es immer weitergeht."
Unbekannt, 20. Jhdt.

"The only good music is the music I like."
Nietzsche, The Case of Wagner

"- Frederick, King of Prussia: and what do you think of Vivaldi? Is it good or bad music?
- J.S. Bach: there is no such thing as good or bad music, there is only the music I like and the music I don't like."
Klaus Eidam, The True Life Of J.s. Bach.

"I once had favorite musicians, favorite bands, favorite songs, I wonder where they have gone now."
Leonard Cohen, interview
